annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 2 of the Cooperative Association Second Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-203, December 2, 1997, 44 DCR 7498).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Applicability date of D.C. Law 18-378: Section 5 of D.C. Law 18-378, as amended by section 7082 of D.C. Law 19-21 provided:
“Sec. 5. Applicability. This act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: D.C. Law 18-378 amended and enacted into law Title 29 of the District of Columbia.
